metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38056 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper Neutralization of commands allowed to be executed via OTRS System Configuration e.g. SchedulerCronTaskModule using UnitTests modules allows any authenticated attacker with admin privileges local execution of Code.This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X before 7.0.45, from 8.0.X before 8.0.35; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
